note.note-paragraph: In this subclass non-limiting references (in the sense of paragraph 39 of the Guide to the IPC) may still be displayed in the scheme.

title-part.text: Working stone or stone-like materials, e.g. brick, concrete

CPC-specific-text.text: or glass

reference.text: fine working of gems, jewels, crystals B28D5/00; working by grinding or polishing B24; devices or means for dressing or conditioning abrasive surfaces B24B53/00

CPC-specific-text.text: Cleaning bricks
Multipurpose machines; Equipment therefor

reference.text: B28D5/007 takes precedence; for grinding and polishing in general B24B57/00

CPC-specific-text.text: or cylindrical
with cylinder saws, e.g. trepanning; saw cylinders, e.g. having their cutting rim equipped with abrasive particles

the saw blade being movable on slide ways

with the work mounted on a carriage
with a plurality of saw blades
the saw blade rotating about its longitudinal axis

Components, e.g. guiding means, vibrations damping means, frames, driving means, suspension

consisting of strap saws

or saw-discs

Saw chains; rod-like saw blades; saw cables

, e.g. chiseling machines

for making holes in easily splittable working materials
